artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Ebisuya Shōshichi
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
description: vertical ōban triptych;bind in a book with 96.146.106*
markings: center and left sheets: red artist\'s toshidama seal; each sheet, censor seals: 吉村 {Yoshimura}, 衣笠 {Kinugasa}; publisher\'s seal: てりふり丁、ゑびすや {Terifuri chō Ebisuya}
medium: Woodblock prints (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: R, L: 香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}; center: 一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga}
text: Related to the play "Kanjinchō" 勧進帳 (The Subscription List), performed at the Kawarazaki Theater, 1849, 3rd month.
title: Actors in The Subscription List, Old Style
